flavorText: "My cats have taught me more about the sacred than anything in some old ruin."

foreignData.flavorText: „Meine Katzen haben mich mehr über das Heilige gelehrt als alles andere in irgendeiner alten Ruine."
foreignData.name: Begleitete Heilerin
foreignData.text:
Immer wenn du zum ersten Mal in einem Zug Lebenspunkte dazuerhältst, erzeuge einen 1/1 weißen Katze-Kreaturenspielstein.
{2}{W}: Ein anderer Kleriker deiner Wahl erhält Lebensverknüpfung bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.flavorText: "Mis gatos me enseñaron más sobre lo sagrado que cualquier cosa en ruinas remotas".
foreignData.name: Sanadora acompañada
foreignData.text:
Siempre que ganes vidas por primera vez cada turno, crea una ficha de criatura Felino blanca 1/1.
{2}{W}: Otro Clérigo objetivo gana la habilidad de vínculo vital hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: « Mes chats m'ont appris davantage sur le sacré que ce qu'on peut trouver dans une vieille ruine. »
foreignData.name: Guérisseuse accompagnée
foreignData.text:
À chaque fois que vous gagnez des points de vie pour la première fois à chaque tour, créez un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche Chat.
{2}{W} : Un autre clerc ciblé acquiert le lien de vie jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: "I miei felini mi hanno insegnato di più su ciò che è sacro di qualsiasi cosa possiate trovare in qualche vecchia rovina."
foreignData.name: Guaritrice Accompagnata
foreignData.text:
Ogniqualvolta guadagni punti vita per la prima volta in ogni turno, crea una pedina creatura Felino 1/1 bianca.
{2}{W}: Un altro Chierico bersaglio ha legame vitale fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 「古い遺跡のどんなものよりも、私の猫が神聖とは何かを教えてくれた。」
foreignData.name: 従者つきの癒し手
foreignData.text:
あなたが各ターン最初にライフを得るたび、白の１/１の猫・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。
{2}{W}：他のクレリック１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは絆魂を得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — コー・クレリック

foreignData.flavorText: "옛 폐허 따위에 있는 그 어떤 것보다도 내 고양이들이 신성함에 대해 더 많은 걸 가르쳐 주었지."
foreignData.name: 수행원을 거느린 치유사
foreignData.text:
당신이 매 턴 처음으로 생명점을 얻을 때마다, 1/1 백색 고양이 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
{2}{W}: 다른 성직자를 목표로 정한다. 그 목표는 턴종료까지 생명연결을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Os meus gatos já me ensinaram mais sobre o sagrado do que qualquer coisa em qualquer ruína velha."
foreignData.name: Curandeira Acompanhada
foreignData.text:
Toda vez que você ganhar pontos de vida pela primeira vez a cada turno, crie uma ficha de criatura branca 1/1 do tipo Felino.
{2}{W}: Outro Clérigo alvo ganha vínculo com a vida até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: «Мои кошки больше рассказали мне о священном, чем какие угодно древние руины».
foreignData.name: Сопровождаемая Целительница
foreignData.text:
Каждый раз, когда вы получаете жизнь(-и) в первый раз в каждом ходу, создайте одну фишку существа 1/1 белая Кошка.
{2}{W}: другой целевой Священник получает Цепь жизни до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我身旁这些猫教会我有关圣物的事情，比某些古老遗迹还要多。」
foreignData.name: 照护治疗师
foreignData.text:
每当你每回合首度获得生命时，派出一个1/1白色的猫衍生生物。
{2}{W}：另一个目标僧侣获得系命异能直到回合结束。

foreignData.flavorText: 「我身旁這些貓教會我有關聖物的事情，比某些古老遺跡還要多。」
foreignData.name: 照護治療師
foreignData.text:
每當你每回合首度獲得生命時，派出一個1/1白色的貓衍生生物。
{2}{W}：另一個目標僧侶獲得繫命異能直到回合結束。

name: Attended Healer
originalText:
Whenever you gain life for the first time each turn, create a 1/1 white Cat creature token.
{2}{W}: Another target Cleric gains lifelink until end of turn.

rulings.text: Multiple instances of lifelink on the same creature are redundant.
An ability that triggers “whenever you gain life” triggers just once for each life-gaining event, no matter how much life you gain.

Each creature with lifelink dealing combat damage causes a separate life-gaining event. For example, if two creatures you control with lifelink deal combat damage at the same time, a “whenever you gain life” ability will trigger twice. However, if a single creature you control with lifelink deals combat damage to multiple creatures, players, and/or planeswalkers at the same time (perhaps because it has trample or was blocked by more than one creature), the ability will trigger only once.
If you gain an amount of life “for each” of something, that life is gained as one event and the ability will trigger only once.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, life gained by your teammate won’t cause the ability to trigger, even though it caused your team’s life total to increase.

An ability that triggers whenever you gain life “for the first time each turn” won’t trigger if you gain life during a turn before the permanent with that ability is on the battlefield, even if you gain life again later in the turn.

text:
Whenever you gain life for the first time each turn, create a 1/1 white Cat creature token.
{2}{W}: Another target Cleric gains lifelink until end of turn.
